name: Donut Clicker!
description: Welcome to Donut Clicker! A game made for passing time! Heavily inspired by "Cookie Clicker". Test yourself to see how much time you can waste playing this! Post feedback and scores in the comments! This is also created by a crew of people, not just me. This was also made on Scratch. If you wish to see the Scratch page for earlier updates, check it here: " https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/623872418/ " Have a Great Time!
